text:
Organizations are moving their enterprise network-attached-storage
and applications to AWS as fast as they can
to scale more efficiently, innovate faster and reduce cost

Many of these organizations store their application
data in on-premises NetApp ONTAP file systems
and need these like-for-like features in the cloud

Others are looking for high-performance, scalable storage
accessible from Windows, Linux, and MacOS
Introducing Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP
fully managed file storage built on ONTAP’s data management software

delivering the value of ONTAP together with an AWS-native
managed service and allowing you to Do more with your data

Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP provides
familiar ONTAP features such as

enabling you to easily migrate, burst, or back up virtually any
on-premises applications or workloads that require shared storage

Maximize availability, security, and performance
while lowering costs with support for tiering
from SSD storage to low-cost, fully elastic storage

As a fully managed service, FSx for NetApp ONTAP
also helps eliminate the overhead and complexity

associated with managing on-premises file storage...
enabling you to focus on building applications faster

Get started in minutes by creating
an FSx for NetApp ONTAP file system

using the AWS Management Console, Amazon FSx’s
Command Line Interface or API
